name: Chill bee
description:
Description

Just chill while flying as a bee, pollinate flowers and bring back life to spring in this tiny world.

Gamepad recommended

Made for the Great Spring Jam 2021.

Controls

Move : zqsd / left Joystick

Camera control : mouse / right joystick
